QuestData.Title: Secrets of the Qiraji
QuestData.Description: You have discovered an ancient Qiraji artifact! Perhaps one of the dragons near the entrance of the temple would have a use for this relic.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Ancient Qiraji Artifact to the dragons hiding near the entrance of the temple.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're glowing! I know what that means...
QuestData.RewardText: An exceptional find, $N. Simply marvelous! This will definitely give us some insight into our enemy's twisted minds.
